dot:

A. Lucas vs Sir Flinders Petrie"];drilling_techniques[label="Drilling Techniques
1. Tubular Drill with Fixed Points
2. Loose Abrasive Powder"];evidence[label="Evidence

2. Concentric Lines"];hypotheses[label="Hypotheses
